author: DarkWolfz
title: Creator Santa
review: This set was pretty good. Very simple. An easy build that took less than ten minutes.

author: Puidwen
title: it's all right for what it is
review: Found it and got it for a $1.00.  It's composed of a lot of small parts.  Be careful when opening the bag, it almost sent parts flying everywhere.  It's sort of built like a miniature lower quality brickheadz.  Because of the small parts it felt very "fiddly" when building it, even though it's an easy build.  Santa looks like a santa, but i can't help but feel that he could of look even more like a santa with just a few more parts.

author: StevenTheBrick
title: Santa
review:
2/5

Building Experience, parts, value, and playability are meh.
